issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Embedded metastore clients can't be retried, they throw an exception - "For direct MetaStore DB connections, we don't support retries at the client level."

This tends to mask the real error that caused the attempts to retry. RetryingMetaStoreClient shouldn't even attempt to reconnect when direct/embedded metastore client is used.
fields.summary: RetryingMetaStoreClient retries non retriable embedded metastore client

comments.body:
Example of the useless error -
